Name: TheBeanstalk
About the game: Once upon a time there was a single mother who lived with her only son, Jack. One day when she has no more food to eat, her mother tells Jack that she gives her enough cows to sell to her Jack and sells them to buy something to eat. Along the way, lazy Jack meets a stranger and trades three beans for a cow with mysterious powers. Upon returning to her home, her mother, angry that the cows had been replaced with beans, threw them away and overnight grew into a large, beautiful bean tree. Jack reached the giant's castle in the sky riding the beanstalk that grew into the sky. But the gates were tightly shut... the Gameplay and Features Journey to reach the destination by crossing various obstacles using the keyboard and mouse. This game can be played by anyone, regardless of age. Learn some controls, then it will be easier for you to play this game. When you finish your first run, set a record. There is a timer in the game that will be useful for setting records. Genre simulation, single, difficultly ... etc
